description.value: Your flesh tears and warps as you transform. Attempt Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] each enemy within 30 feet. This Demoralize loses the auditory trait and gains the visual trait, and you don't take a penalty if a creature doesn't understand your language. Regardless of the results of your checks, each creature is temporarily immune to Terrifying Transformation for 1 minute.

value.value: you were afflicted with the curse of the werecreature
